name: Aleph-Null
description:
Game made for in a week for https://itch.io/jam/bullet-jam-2021.

Controlls:

WASD/Arrows/Left Analog - movement

Spacebar/Shift/Any button on the right of the controller - dash (after unlocking)

Menu and options may not work the best on controllers, so I reccomend using a mouse for clicking the UI.

Credits:

Player model - https://skfb.ly/6QWKn by Charles Cloutier

Bullet system - https://wayfarergames.itch.io/bulletfury by WayfarerGames

Powered with FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies Pty Ltd.

Outlines may not display correctly on Linux, and the game is currently untested on macOS, so there might be issues I'm not aware of.
